item.description:
Join NHCer Naim for Karaoke Wednesday Night at the Corner Pocket in Orange.

Group members plan to be there at 9:00 PM or a little before.

The Corner Pocket Cafe is a Pool Hall in Orange on the Boston Post Road.  They host Karaoke two nights a week, amongst various other events.  Being a Pool Hall they obviously also have Billiards, and Naim tells me the food is good.

Naim will host this meetup so attempt to find him when you get there.  If it's too crowded or he's not in plain sight then he can be reached at 860-324-8780.

Thanks for hosting Naim!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Naim (860-324-8780) or other members whom have RSVPed, it's not anticipated to be busy otherwise.
item.name: Karaoke at "The Corner Pocket Cafe"
